content:
"Learn to Fly" is an excellent choice! It's a great song to start with, and I'm sure you'll have a blast playing it.

For Foo Fighters guitar tabs and chord sheets, I recommend checking out the following websites:

**Ultimate-Guitar.com**: Ultimate-Guitar has an extensive collection of Foo Fighters guitar tabs, chords, and lyrics. They have a dedicated section for "Learn to Fly" with multiple tablatures, chord sheets, and lyrics.

**Songsterr.com**: Songsterr offers interactive guitar tabs and lessons for many Foo Fighters songs, including "Learn to Fly." Their tabs are accurate and easy to follow, and they also provide a chord chart and lyrics.

**Musicnotes.com**: Musicnotes is a reliable source for digital sheet music, including guitar tabs and chord sheets. They have a wide selection of Foo Fighters songs, including "Learn to Fly."

**FooFighters.com**: The official Foo Fighters website occasionally posts guitar tabs and chord sheets for their songs, including "Learn to Fly." Keep an eye on their website, as they might update their resources from time to time.

**Other resources**:

* **GuitarTabs.cc**: A simple website with a large collection of guitar tabs, including Foo Fighters songs.
* **Chordie.com**: A chord sheet database with a vast collection of songs, including Foo Fighters.
* **911Tabs.com**: A guitar tab database with a large collection of Foo Fighters songs.

When using online resources, make sure to check the accuracy of the tabs and chord sheets. Sometimes, they might not be 100% correct, so it's essential to double-check with other sources or use your own ear to adjust the tabs to your liking.

Remember, practice makes perfect, so have fun learning "Learn to Fly" and enjoy playing it!
